navigation.cloud-modern-work: Cloud na Ntchito ya Masiku Ghano

hero.title: Kusintha kwa Digital ku Malawi wa Masiku Ghano
hero.subtitle: Kupatsa mphamvu boma, mabizinesi, na anthu ammudzi na mayankho ya cloud yapamwamba, chidziwitso cha AI, na yilumikiro ya digital yatsopano.

services.title: Yilumikiro Yathu
services.subtitle: Mayankho athunthu ya digital yopangidwa kwa zosowa za Malawi

cloud-modern-work.title: Cloud na Ntchito ya Masiku Ghano
cloud-modern-work.description: Kusamutsa ku Azure, kukhazikitsa Microsoft 365, na mayankho ya malo ogwira ntchito yamakono

data-ai.title: Data na AI
data-ai.description: Kusanthula kwa Power BI, ulamuliro wa data, na chidziwitso cha AI

security-compliance.title: Chitetezo na Kusatira Malamulo
security-compliance.description: Microsoft Defender, malamulo osatira, na chitetezo cha cyber

power-platform.title: Power Platform
power-platform.description: Yipulogalamu yosavuta kupanga, makina, na mayankho yapadera

government-portals.title: Yi Portal ya Boma
government-portals.description: Yilumikiro ya nzika, nsanja ya e-boma, na kusintha kwa digital

managed-services.title: Yilumikiro Yoyang'aniridwa
managed-services.description: Chithandizo cha 24/7, kuyang'anira, na zida za cloud zoyang'aniridwa

contact.title: Lumirizganani nafe
contact.subtitle: Mwakonzeka kusintha mapangidwe ghanu gha digital? Tiyeni tikambirane zofunikira zanu.

form.name: Dzina Lonse
form.phone-placeholder: Lembani nambala yanu ya foni (zosakhala zachikakamiza)
form.organization-placeholder: Lembani dzina la bungwe lanu (zosakhala zachikakamiza)
form.message-placeholder: Tiwuzeni zomwe mukufuna ndipo mmene tingakuthandizirentu
form.consent: Ndikuvomera malamulo ya chinsinsi na malamulo yogwirira ntchito
form.error: Pepani, panali chachilema pothumiza chingerezi chanu. Chonde yesaninso.

footer.description: Mgwirizano wamkulu wa kusintha kwa digital ku Malawi, kupereka mayankho ya cloud yatsopano na yilumikiro ya AI kwa yokasitomala ya boma na mabizinesi.
footer.partners-description: Ogwirizana ovomerezeka opereka mayankho yapamwamba kwambiri

holo-school.title: Pulojekiti ya Holo-School
holo-school.subtitle: Njira yatsopano ya kuperekedwa yiphunziro ya holographic ku miyendo ya Malawi

hero.title: Kubweretsa Yiphunziro Yapamwamba ku Mudzi Uliwonse
hero.description: Kugwiritsa ntchito tekinoloje ya holographic, ntchito za cloud za Azure, na zida za kuwulutsa za MACRA kuti yaperekeza zokumana nazo za yiphunziro ku madera yakutali ya Malawi.

why.title: Chifukwa chiyani Holo-School?
points: Kuthana na kusalingana kwa yiphunziro m'madera yakumidzi
Kupereka mwayi wopeza yiphunzitsi yokwanira kudzera pa tekinoloje
Njira yolimba ya kuperekedwa kudzera pa tekinoloje ya RF
Yankho lomwe lingafalitsidwe ku dziko lonse

how.title: Mmene Zimagwirira Ntchito
steps: Kupanga zinthu mu studio ya Azure Media Services
Kuwulutsa pa nthawi yeniyeni kudzera pa Microsoft Teams
Kuwulutsa kwa MACRA RF ku yi screen ya hologram yammudzi
Mawu ogwirizana kudzera pa yi headset yopanda zingwe

pilot.title: Pulogalamu ya Yiyeso
pilot.description: Pulogalamu ya yiyeso pamalo yatatu kuonetsa kuti zidzatheke ndikuyeza zotsatira

tech.title: Zida za Tekinoloje
tech.azure: Azure Media Services pakuperekedwa kwazinthu na CDN
tech.teams: Microsoft Teams pakumana na anthu pa nthawi yeniyeni
tech.apps: Power Apps pakuonera kopezeka na ndemanga

cta.title: Pemphan Kalata ya Yiyeso
cta.description: Pezani zambiri za kukhazikitsa pulogalamu ya yiyeso ya Holo-School

assistant.title: Wothandiza wa AI
assistant.placeholder: Funitsani chilichonse cha yilumikiro yathu, mayankho, kapena mmene tingakuthandizirentu...
assistant.error: Pepani, ndili na chachilema tsopano. Chonde yesaninso.
assistant.welcome: Moni! Ndine wothandiza wanu wa Korena Digital Solutions. Kodi ndingathandize bwanji lero?
